items.content_html: A lightweight, open-source web browser extension for adjusting volume and equalizing sound. Built with performance and efficiency in mind, it's designed to work on both high-end and low-end hardware. Contributions and pull requests welcome!
items.title: ChristianE00/AudioKit:  A lightweight, open-source web browser extension for adjusting volume and equalizing sound. Built with performance and efficiency in mind, it's designed to work on both high-end and low-end hardware. Contributions and pull requests welcome!

items.content_html: LLRT (Low Latency Runtime) is an experimental, lightweight JavaScript runtime designed to address the growing demand for fast and efficient Serverless applications.

items.content_html: A lightweight JavaScript library that provides a high level and model based API for interacting with Firebase.
items.title: fireboose/fireboose: A lightweight JavaScript library that provides a high level and model based API for interacting with Firebase.

items.content_html: Envelop is a lightweight library allowing developers to easily develop, share, collaborate and extend their GraphQL execution layer. Envelop is the missing GraphQL plugin system.
items.title: n1ru4l/envelop: Envelop is a lightweight library allowing developers to easily develop, share, collaborate and extend their GraphQL execution layer. Envelop is the missing GraphQL plugin system.

items.content_html: A lightweight, portfolio CRM project showcasing skills in modern web development technologies such as Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. miniCRM includes essential features like user management, an organizational chart, and real-time performance metrics.

items.content_html: WoodChuck is a lightweight and extensible logging library for TypeScript, designed to simplify the process of logging messages in your applications. With customizable logging levels, type safety, and support for plugins, WoodChuck offers a flexible solution to track and understand your application's behavior.
items.title: JaCraig/Woodchuck: WoodChuck is a lightweight and extensible logging library for TypeScript, designed to simplify the process of logging messages in your applications. With customizable logging levels, type safety, and support for plugins, WoodChuck offers a flexible solution to track and understand your application's behavior.
